description.value:
A kit containing shaving gear, soap, dental items, and other appropriately neccissary self-care items. May also contain Anti-Fungal and Parasite powders.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Common

Notes: 2 T
